original: intros F x f Hfilt Hlim. unfold is_filter_lim in *. unfold filtermap. intros P Hloc. apply Hlim. intros Q HQ. unfold filterlim in Hfilt. pose (G := fun x : U => Q (f x)). assert (filter_le (filtermap f F) G). { intros R HR. apply HQ. } apply (filterlim_filter_le_2 f G (filtermap f F) Hfilt) in H. apply H. apply (Hfilt _ Hloc).
